column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A foreigner died after leaving a rented house on National Road 3 with his Cambodian wife.------The two had gone out in a tuk tuk for something to eat
column6: a 49 year old German national complained of feeling unwell.------ He got out of the tuk tuk
column7: lay down and suddenly died of a suspected heart attack.------The incident happened at 10:10 pm on Monday
column9: 2019 along National Road 4  in Por Sen Chey District
column10: Phnom Penh.------The man lived in a rented apartment on the outskirts of the city with Va Phalla
column11: a 45-year-old Khmer woman.------Photos of scene in link:------RASMEI KAMPUCHEA
